mapiyan ha du daruwan athara aadaraya gana puna puna kiyana aagam wisin pirimiyeku ha gahaniyaku athara da minisun dedeneku athara da athi aadarayata da watinakamak ek kara katha karanu daknata labe.mapiyan ha du daruwan athara shakthimath bandimak athi kara ganima sandaha mapiyan ekineka kerehi aadarayen pasu wima awashya bawa awadharanaya kere.eeta awashya parisaraya athi kirima samaja wagakimak lesa salakanu labe.

samanyamayen waradi karuwa soyagana nadu margayata basa nadu asa daduwam dimata kalayak gathawe.lankawe thathwaya anuwanam nadu wisada withthikaruta daduwama labena wita perahara gos ali betith weli hamaraya .me nisama apita rajyatha nithiyata wada kala nithiyehi guna pilibada sith pahala wanu labayinamuth athi gataluwa nam api daduwama laba denne warudda kala pudgalayatama da yannayi.jiwa widyakawata anuwa menma pudgalayage manasika menma kayika thathwayada mohothin mohotha wenaswanu labayi .udaharanayak lesa 1990 di nimal wisin siwathambiwa maradamayi.naduwa asa daduwam kirimata sarasenne 1999 ye diya .esenam pudgalayage manasika menma kayika thathwayada mohothin mohotha wenas wanu labayi nam ada sitinne 1990 siti nimal nowana athara 1999 di sitina nimalta siwathambi maradamimata daduwam labadima sadarana da?eda siti pudgalayakuta dena daduwama ada sitina pudgalayata dima sadaranada?mak nisada yath ada sitina nimal wada yahapath pudgalayak wiya hakiya.oba me pilibadawa mokada hithanne ?(meya darshana wishaya thuladi ma kanata watunu gataluwaki.)
